      Return web server.

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getServer

        public static IServer getServer(java.lang.String webAppDir,
                                int port,
                                java.lang.String context,
                                int scanIntervalSeconds)
        Return web server.

        important: if scanIntervalSeconds < 1 then you will turn off the hot swap

        パラメータ:
        webAppDir - the directory of the project web root
        port - the port
        context - the context
        scanIntervalSeconds - the scan interval seconds
